wrapper.title: Skills
wrapper.annotation: Your AI Assistant is multi-skill which means that at each step in the conversation your Assistant picks the skill to create the response.

annotation.web_chat: Web Chat: add the code below and paste it into your website to embed the chat widget

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource

404.title: Page not found!
404.message: We couldn’t find the page you were looking for. The link you clicked may be broken or the page may have been removed or renamed!

500.title: Internal Server Error!
500.message: The server has been deserted for a while. Please be patient or try again later.

503.title: Sorry, we’re under maintenance!
503.message: Hang on till we get the error fixed.  You may also refresh the page or try again later.

access_api_keys.desc: Personal access tokens allow your AI Assistants to use third-party services like OpenAI, GNews, News API, etc. You can always remove these tokens here if you want to stop use of the services they provide access to by your AI Assistants, or you can revoke these tokens in their respective services. Do not give out your personal access tokens to anybody you don't want to access your files.

token_field.label: Add a new personal access token:

access_api_keys.checkbox: Allow using your OpenAI key to interact with Deepy

toasts.not_found_service: Not found Service or User id.

annotation.first_line: The API key for this AI Assistant is stored in your browser.
annotation.second_line: Please be aware that without adding the API key, the Assistant will not function as intended.

edit.subheader: Change name and description for your Assistant

assistant.subheader: Enter name and description for your Assistant

name_field.label: Name
name_field.placeholder: A short name describing your Virtual Assistant

desc_field.label: Description
desc_field.placeholder: Describe your Virtual Assistant ability, where you can use it and for what purpose

language_field.annotation: This will have an impact on future components of AI Assistants, which will affect how your AI Assistant responds.
language_field.label: Choose preferred AI Assistant language:

confirm_api_key_update.header: Do you want to update a <mark>{{serviceName}}</mark> token you have already added?

delete_assistant.header: Do you really want to delete Assistant:
delete_assistant.public_subheader: Your Assistant will be removed for the public templates.

delete_assistants.header: All your assistants will be deleted

delete_skill.header: Do you really want to delete skill:

hide_public_assistant.header: Your Assistant will be removed from public templates. Continue?
hide_public_assistant.subheader: You will have to publish it again to make it a Public Template

publish_assistant.header: Change who can see your Assistant?

tooltips.public: Everyone can clone and talk to your VA
tooltips.unlisted:
Anyone with this link can talk to your VA.

This VA won’t appear in Public Store
unless you adds it to a public category

share_assistant.content_to_share: Check out this Generative Assistant I made !

sign_in.build: To build your own <mark>Assistant</mark>, please sign in
sign_in.settings: Sign in to access the settings

create_from_scratch.subheader: You are creating a skill that uses <mark>large language models</mark>

name_field.label: Name
name_field.placeholder: A short name describing your Virtual Assistant’s skill

desc_field.label: Description
desc_field.placeholder: Describe your Virtual Assistant’s skill ability, where you can use it and for what purpose

skill_prompt_quit.header: Do you want to close skill editing page?
skill_prompt_quit.subheader: Your data won’t be saved, save it before closing.

header.annotation: Pick which language to use in the Service for creating AI assistants.
header.title: Change Language

publish_warning_modal.title: Important
publish_warning_modal.upper: When your assistant is added to "Public Templates", it goes through moderation. You can't edit it during this time. If approved, editing requires removal from public templates. If not approved, visibility reverts and you can freely edit it.

add_email_modal.title: Enter your email address
add_email_modal.subtitle: Getting your AI assistants published involves a review by our team. To keep you updated on the review outcomes, we'll need your email.

warningsInfo.no_error: The selected model does not contain any errors

deploy.subheader: In order to start chat with AI Assistant, it is necessary to build it
deploy.loading_time_text: This may take a few minutes.
deploy.error: The Assistant build failed, please try again later.

assistant_dialog.timeout_error:
The server is taking longer than usual to process your request. There may have been a network problem.
Refresh the dialog session or wait for the response processing to complete.

message_field.placeholder: Describe here your use case and Deepy will help you to generate a prompt for it.

error.token_error: You see this error message because this platform installation wasn't provided with a working OpenAI key or that key has been expired or has insufficient funds on it. You can either fix the key or you can provide your end user OpenAI key in the profile to make Deepy work for you.
error.auth_error: You see this error message because this platform installation wasn't provided with a working OpenAI key. To interact with Deepy, you need to sign in and then you can enter your OpenAI key in your profile.

skill.dummyDescription: A skill that responds things like "I do not know" when there are no relevant skills to generate an answer.

tooltips.clone_for_edit: You need to clone the virtual Assistant to edit

tooltips.deepy: Ask Deepy if you need help with building your Assistant

required.skill_label: Enter your personal access token for {{service}} to talk to this Generative AI Skill
required.assistant_label: Enter your personal access token for {{service}} to talk to this AI Assistant
required.link: Enter your personal access token here
required.auth_required: To start a talk with an AI assistant, you need to log in.

assistants_not_loaded.header: Oops, something went wrong... Please try again later.

prompt.lengthMax: The length of the prom exceeds the permissible value.
prompt.languageUndefined: We were unable to determine the language of your prompt.
prompt.type: Your invitation does not contain a test. Make sure it's written correctly.
prompt.blocks: You may be using a prompt unit that is not supported by this model:

error_message.error: You can't build the assistant with huge errors, please fix them.
error_message.warning: You have recommendations; perhaps your assistant will not work the way you want.

mock_modal.text: This functionality is limited in the demo version
